title: Mahindra expands LCV range with product based on multi-energy platform
description: Mahindra & Mahindra has launched the Veero light commercial vehicle in the sub-3.5 tonne category, with diesel and CNG options starting at Rs 7.99 lakh. An electric version will follow. The new range aims to strengthen M&M's market leadership, addressing diverse business needs with multiple fuel options and payloads.
